info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 10:13AM EDT by NWS Wakefield VA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...
James River At Richmond Locks affecting City of Richmond and Henrico County.
James River At Richmond Westham affecting City of Richmond, Chesterfield and Henrico Counties.
For the Lower James Basin...including Richmond Locks, Richmond Westham...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...James River at Richmond Locks.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Rocketts Landing Park and the Virginia Capital Trail begin to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:54 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:54 AM EDT Thursday was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain above flood stage through early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 09/19/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Henrico, VA; City of Richmond, VA
